content.question: The Ludovisi Battle Sarcophagus demonstrates a change from earlier Roman relief sculpture in its

choices.label: rejection of perspective to create a crowded scene of chaos
use of shallow relief to highlight abstract, geometric forms
repetition of important characters to create a scrolling narrative
attention to classical proportions to shape idealized figures

content.answer: rejection of perspective to create a crowded scene of chaos

topic.text: 2.2: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Explain how a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
